name: agricultureinformationsystem
description: A comprehensive web application designed to empower farmers with modern agricultural insights. It features real-time crop information, including growth conditions, costs, and disease risks. Farmers can access articles and videos on modern farming techniques, upload images of diseased crops for AI-driven diagnosis and solutions, and leverage voice search in multiple languages. The platform also supports crop price tracking and sales directly through the system.
author: Hompushparaj Mehta ( Pushparaj )
